songs.title: She Looks So Perfect (Live)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Ashton, Luke & Michael]
I wanna say thank you to every single person that is here, you rule
Thank you for getting the album, thank you for coming down today
And thank you for being awesome in general, thank you very much
Give it up for yourselves
Give it up for you guys
Alright here we go
Last song we’re gonna play is a cover of Barbie Girl
This is She Looks So Perfect, thank you so much
Sing along if you know it, goodnight
Hey, hey, hey, hey
Hey, hey, hey, hey

[Verse 1: Luke]
Simmer down, simmer down
They say we’re too young now to amount to anything else
But look around, we worked too damn hard for this just to give it up now, sing
If you don’t swim, you’ll drown, but don’t move, honey

[Chorus: All]
You look so perfect, standing there in my American Apparel underwear
And I know now, that I’m so down
Your lipstick stain is a work of art, I got your name tattooed in an arrow heart
And I know now, that I’m so down
Hey, hey, hey, hey
Hey, hey, hey, hey

[Verse 2: Calum]
Let’s get out, let’s get out cause this deadbeat town’s only here just to keep us down
While I was out, I found myself alone, lemme hear ya
If I showed up with a plane ticket and a shiny diamond ring with your name on it
Would you wanna run away too? Cause all I really want is you

[Chorus: All & Ashton]
You look so perfect standing there in my American Apparel underwear
And I know now, that I’m so down
I made a mixtape straight out of ‘94, I’ve got your ripped skinny jeans lying on the floor
And I know now, that I’m so down
1 2 3 4
Hey, hey, hey, hey
Hey, hey, hey, hey

[Bridge: Luke]
You look so perfect standing there in my American Apparel underwear
And I know now, hands up, that I’m so down
Your lipstick stain is a work of art, I got your name tattooed in an arrow heart
And I know now, that everybody go nuts

[Chorus: All]
You look so perfect standing there in my American Apparel underwear
And I know now, that I’m so down
Your lipstick stain is a work of art, I got your name tattooed in an arrow heart
And I know now, that I’m so down

[Outro: Ashton & Luke]
Alright
Thank you
